content: to make the yellow stitches be showing too make sure you have 10 yellow stitches 27 single_crochet in orange single_crochet in yellow but insert the hook into the lower v of the yellow stitch in the previous row this should be one stitch to the left as you are decreasing the yellow but you want these v to connect with each other 3 single_crochet in yellow 36 round 17 decrease in yellow 2 single_crochet in yellow single_crochet in yellow but insert the hook into the lower v of the yellow stitch in the previous row make sure you have 8 yellow stitches 4 single_crochet in orange decrease in orange x 4 4 single_crochet in orange single_crochet in yellow but insert the hook into the pokeball to charzard reversible pattern by the nerd gremlin lower v of the yellow stitch in the previous row this should be one stitch to the left as you are decreasing the yellow but you want these v to connect with each other decrease in yellow 30 round 18 2 single_crochet in yellow single_crochet in yellow but insert the hook into the lower v of the yellow stitch in the previous row this should be one stitch to the left as you are decreasing the yellow but you want these v to connect with each other single_crochet in orange in the same v hole make sure you have 5 yellow stitches 25 single_crochet in yellow but insert the hook into the lower v of the yellow stitch in the previous row this should be one stitch to the left as you are decreasing the yellow but you want these v to connect with each other single_crochet in yellow 30 round 19 single_crochet in yellow but insert the hook into the lower v of the yellow stitch in the previous row this should be one stitch to the left as you are decreasing the yellow but you want these v to connect with each other single_crochet in orange in the same v hole make sure you have 3 yellow stitches 2 single_crochet in orange decrease in orange x 6 2 single_crochet in orange 24 round 20 3 single_crochet in orange in the back loops of the yellow stitches 21 single_crochet in orange the rest of the rounds will be worked in orange 24 round 21 2 single_crochet decrease x 6 18 round 22 single_crochet decrease x 6 12 round 22 12 single_crochet but worked in the back loops round 23 6 decrease 6 round 24 sew opening closed by threading tapestry needle though all 6 single_crochet outer legs hide the tail in some stitches and leave the rest of the tail in the pokemon there are several pieces you will make and attach to the body i recommend crocheting them all then attaching them together i put sewing instructions for each piece just after each one though head top dome use orange yarn round 1 6 single_crochet magic_ring with 6 single_crochet round 2 increase x 6 12
